description: Desirable 3 Bed + Den Glenmore End-Unit Townhome! Centrally located near shopping and restaurants, and just a 15-minute walk to Southridge School. Offering over 1,698 sq ft of living space, there’s plenty of room to spread out. The main floor features a powder room, a functional kitchen with patio access, a spacious dining area, and a well-appointed living room with ample built-in storage. Upstairs you’ll find three bedrooms, including a primary with ensuite, a second full bathroom, and two additional generously sized rooms. Downstairs is a large rec room/den, plus a side-by-side double garage and a private, fenced yard. Residents enjoy exclusive access to community amenities including a gym, floor hockey rink, billiards, pool, and hot-tub. Call now!
